Question: NASA presented this person with a moon rock sample from the early Apollo expeditions spanning 1969 to 1972.
Hints: This person wrote a syndicated opinion column for King Features Syndicate.
This person anchored the network's coverage of the 1952 presidential election as well as later conventions.
Unusually, this person was a Novice-class licensee—the entry level license—for his entire, and long, tenure in the hobby.
